full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA SGRUB ZHU'I PHYIR GLU GUR DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES CHOS SKYONG LCAM @010A *, ,SRING LA GYIS GUR MCHOD PA THUGS RJE BSKUL BA'I DBYAR GYI RNGA SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DGE TSUL SBYIN PA SHES RAB BSKUL BA'I NGOR SLOB MA 'DI NYID KYI NGOR, GRUB CHEN KU RA TZA'I SKYE DNGOS SU BIKshU BADZRA MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
